title: Threat of U.S.-Russia clash hangs over Syria
text:
Threat of U.S.-Russia clash hangs over Syria 2:42pm EDT - 02:08 
The United States and its ally France assailed Syria’s Bashar al-Assad at the United Nations on Friday for using chemical weapons as the prospect of U.S.-led military action that could lead to confrontation with Russia hung over the Middle East.   
The United States and its ally France assailed Syria’s Bashar al-Assad at the United Nations on Friday for using chemical weapons as the prospect of U.S.-led military action that could lead to confrontation with Russia hung over the Middle East.  //reut.rs/2IUEAz1
